A battle pass with an absurdly massive grind attached to it, but they've added no new content over the YEARS the game's been out. Woulda been great if they added literally anything to keep new players playing instead of throwing in an overpriced cosmetic store and now a battle pass just to milk their players. All they do is release a new killer every 3 months for a small spurt of player injection and everyone leaves after a couple weeks. 

Seriously the Median playtime for a game that's been out for years is a little under 18 hours while the average is in the hundreds, which means new players are only playing for a couple weeks then quitting leading to the worst matchmaking in a game i've ever seen. New players shouldnt be going up against people with 600+ hours. (When I first bought this game in the two hours I played as killer not ONE player has less than 450 hours played)

Maybe if they bothered to actually do anything with the game instead of milking it and bleeding it dry at the same they'd have a more stable playerbase.

Peepeepoopooman
M&M stands for Mars and Murrie.
Forrest Mars (son of the Mars Company founder) first spotted the British confection Smarties during the Spanish Civil War and noticed the candy shell prevented the chocolate from melting. He teamed up with Bruce Murrie (son of Hershey Chocolate's president) and the company later trademarked the "Melts in Your Mouth, Not in Your Hand" slogan.

the game itself is good, its fun on both sides, though it has a steep learning curve.  it can also be very frustrating, some of the mechanics can be annoying, though they have improved over the years ive played it

the biggest drawback is the same drawback as most multiplayer games: the community.

if you turn chat off, problem solved, but if you don't, big yikes: if you play even an ounce different then the "survivor rule book" dictates, people get big mad, that said, sometimes you just gotta accept thats part of the fun, that people get so mad over you enjoying a game differently then you

in summary: good game, has its issues, i'd reccomend it for its price, considering the number of hours i have.
Overall fun game with definite bugs, but I always have fun no matter what. Also cool additions with killers and survivors !

Отличная игра, задумка на 10 из 10. Реализация на 7 из 10. Реиграбильность на 10 из 10. Разработчики правда немного криворукие (лаги, вылеты, но они развивают игру). Эта игра даст вам возможность за киллера побегать за другими игроками. И поиграть вместе с друзьями против маньяка.
